price: (वे) बहरे हैं, गूँगे हैं, अंधे हैं। अतः वे नहीं लौटते।
arabic: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: ṣummun buk'mun ʿum'yun fahum lā yarjiʿūna
